text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- King Hassan presides at ministerial meeting on 1997/98 draft budget.
- Colombia's President Samper expected in Morocco soon.
- Prime Minister Filali presides at signing between Pakistan's Al Noor fertilisers firm and Moroccan OCP phosphates giant, concluding $220 million deal earlier this week.
- King confers with former Portuguese president Soares in Rabat.
- Multi-party national council to supervise 1997 elections will meet soon.
- Moroccan, French officials discuss visa procedures.
- Morocco's oil refineries Samir and Societe Cherifienne des Petroles sold to Saudi Corral group for about $419 million.
- International forum on development in Mediterranean to be held in Marrakesh next week.
